mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECRUIT(RECRUIT_CODE, CORP_ID, RECRUIT_TITLE, JOB_TYPE, RECRUIT_CONTENTS, START_DATE, END_DATE, PERSONNEL, JOB_RANK, EMP_TYPE, APP_TYPE, APP_COUNT, JOB_LOCAL) VALUES(#{recruit_code}, #{corp_id}, #{recruit_title}, #{job_type}, #{recruit_contents}, SYSDATE, #{end_date}, #{personnel}, #{job_rank}, #{emp_type}, #{app_type}, #{app_count}, #{job_local})
mapper.select: SELECT RECRUIT_CODE, CORP_ID, RECRUIT_TITLE, JOB_TYPE, RECRUIT_CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') START_DATE, END_DATE, PERSONNEL, JOB_RANK, EMP_TYPE, APP_TYPE, APP_COUNT, JOB_LOCAL FROM RECRUIT

SELECT RECRUIT_CODE, CORP_ID, RECRUIT_TITLE, JOB_TYPE, RECRUIT_CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') START_DATE, END_DATE, PERSONNEL, JOB_RANK, EMP_TYPE, APP_TYPE, APP_COUNT, JOB_LOCAL FROM RECRUIT WHERE RECRUIT_CODE = #{recruit_code}

SELECT RECRUIT_CODE, CORP_ID, RECRUIT_TITLE, JOB_TYPE, RECRUIT_CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') START_DATE, END_DATE, PERSONNEL, JOB_RANK, EMP_TYPE, APP_TYPE, APP_COUNT, JOB_LOCAL FROM RECRUIT WHERE RECRUIT_CODE = (SELECT RECRUIT_CODE FROM SAVE_RECRUIT WHERE SAVE_CODE = (SELECT MAX(SAVE_CODE) FROM SAVE_RECRUIT WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id}))

SELECT RECRUIT_CODE, CORP_ID, RECRUIT_TITLE, JOB_TYPE, RECRUIT_CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') START_DATE, END_DATE, PERSONNEL, JOB_RANK, EMP_TYPE, APP_TYPE, APP_COUNT, JOB_LOCAL FROM RECRUIT WHERE JOB_LOCAL = #{job_local}

SELECT RECRUIT_CODE, CORP_ID, RECRUIT_TITLE, JOB_TYPE, RECRUIT_CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') START_DATE, END_DATE, PERSONNEL, JOB_RANK, EMP_TYPE, APP_TYPE, APP_COUNT, JOB_LOCAL FROM RECRUIT WHERE JOB_TYPE LIKE #{job_type} || ' /%' OR JOB_TYPE LIKE '%/ ' || #{job_type} || ' /%' OR JOB_TYPE LIKE '%/ ' || #{job_type}

SELECT RECRUIT_CODE, CORP_ID, RECRUIT_TITLE, JOB_TYPE, RECRUIT_CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') START_DATE, END_DATE, PERSONNEL, JOB_RANK, EMP_TYPE, APP_TYPE, APP_COUNT, JOB_LOCAL FROM RECRUIT WHERE CORP_ID = #{corp_id}

SELECT A.RECRUIT_CODE, A.CORP_ID, A.RECRUIT_TITLE, A.JOB_TYPE, A.RECRUIT_CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') START_DATE, A.END_DATE, A.PERSONNEL, A.JOB_RANK, A.EMP_TYPE, A.APP_TYPE, A.APP_COUNT, A.JOB_LOCAL FROM RECRUIT A, CORPORATION B WHERE A.CORP_ID = B.CORP_ID AND UPPER(CORP_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{corp_name} || '%')

SELECT RECRUIT_CODE, CORP_ID, RECRUIT_TITLE, JOB_TYPE, RECRUIT_CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') START_DATE, END_DATE, PERSONNEL, JOB_RANK, EMP_TYPE, APP_TYPE, APP_COUNT, JOB_LOCAL FROM RECRUIT WHERE ROWNUM < 8 ORDER BY RECRUIT_CODE DESC

SELECT RECRUIT_CODE, CORP_ID, RECRUIT_TITLE, JOB_TYPE, RECRUIT_CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') START_DATE, END_DATE, PERSONNEL, JOB_RANK, EMP_TYPE, APP_TYPE, APP_COUNT, JOB_LOCAL FROM RECRUIT WHERE JOB_LOCAL = #{job_local}
